Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Incremental Crawling using Heritrix 3.x
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=SDrNv1iXCF8-ZnHS7NetZxMTyANyZVbpdzte0GdF4-VM
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

'Incremental crawling' could mean a number of things.

You may want to look at the following wiki page for some optional 
configurations that can save bandwidth or (more often) storage when 
recrawling the same sites, by avoiding either visits or storage of 
duplicate pages:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Duplication+Reduction+Processors

Be sure to read and understand the 'considerations' section.

- Gordon

On 10/4/12 11:42 AM, badal301 wrote:
> Hi,
>
> i am working on heritrix 3.x for crawling. wanted to know whether
> Heritrix 3.x supports incremental crawling or not ?
>
> if yes, can someone provide me any wiki link or article which
> explains what properties to set or what to modify.
>
> Thanks
